N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1701.3 - Cell selection

State Regulations
(a) The
commissioner or deputy commissioner for correctional facilities shall establish
the specific number of proposed double-cells within a correctional
facility. (b) The superintendent
shall designate specific cells within the facility for proposed conversion to
double-cell housing. Such cells should be distributed as evenly as possible
between cell tiers in general population and located as close to an officer's
station as feasible. Cells within designated special housing units may not be
considered for double-cell housing without approval from the commissioner or
deputy commissioner for correctional facilities. (c) Upon approval by the commissioner or
deputy commissioner for correctional facilities, the facility double-cell
housing plan shall be submitted for authorization to the SCOC in accordance
with Part 762 1 of Title 9, NYCRR
